verses.verse: I have come <S%H935><s%> into my garden, <S%H1588><s%> my sister, <S%H269><s%> my bride. <S%H3618><s%> I have gathered <S%H717><s%> my myrrh <S%H4753><s%> with my spice; <S%H1313><s%> I have eaten <S%H398><s%> my honeycomb <S%H3293><s%> with my honey; <S%H3293><s%> I have drunk <S%H8354><s%> my wine <S%H3196><s%> with my milk. <S%H2461><s%> Friends Eat, <S%H398><s%> friends! <S%H7453><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> yes, <S%H7937><s%> drink abundantly, beloved. <S%H1730><s%> Beloved

I was asleep, <S%H3463><s%> but my heart <S%H3820><s%> was awake. <S%H5782><s%> It is the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my beloved <S%H1730><s%> who knocks: <S%H1849><s%> "Open <S%H6605><s%> to me, <S%H269><s%> my sister, my love, <S%H7474><s%> my dove, <S%H3123><s%> my undefiled; <S%H8535><s%> for my head <S%H7218><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with dew, <S%H2919><s%> and my hair <S%H6977><s%> with the dampness <S%H7447><s%> of the night. <S%H3915><s%>"

I have taken off <S%H6584><s%> my robe. <S%H3801><s%> Indeed, <S%H349><s%> must I put it on? <S%H3847><s%> I have washed <S%H7364><s%> my feet. <S%H7272><s%> Indeed, <S%H349><s%> must I soil them? <S%H2936><s%>
My beloved <S%H1730><s%> thrust his hand <S%H3027><s%> in <S%H7971><s%> through <S%H4480><s%> the latch <S%H2356><s%> opening. <S%H4578><s%> My heart pounded for him. <S%H1993><s%>

I rose up <S%H6965><s%> to open <S%H6605><s%> for my beloved. <S%H1730><s%> My hands <S%H3027><s%> dripped <S%H5197><s%> with myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> my fingers <S%H676><s%> with liquid <S%H5674><s%> myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> on the handles <S%H3709><s%> of the lock. <S%H4514><s%>

I opened <S%H6605><s%> to my beloved; <S%H1730><s%> but my beloved <S%H1730><s%> left; <S%H5674><s%> and had gone <S%H5674><s%> away. <S%H5315><s%> My heart went out <S%H3318><s%> when he spoke. <S%H1696><s%> I looked <S%H1245><s%> for him, <S%H4672><s%> but I didn't find him. <S%H7121><s%> I called him, <S%H6030><s%> but he didn't answer.

The watchmen <S%H8104><s%> who go about <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> me. <S%H5221><s%> They beat me. <S%H6481><s%> They bruised me. <S%H8104><s%> The keepers of the walls <S%H2346><s%> took my cloak <S%H7289><s%> away from me. <S%H5375><s%>

I adjure <S%H7650><s%> you, <S%H1323><s%> daughters of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> If you find <S%H4672><s%> my beloved, <S%H1730><s%> that you tell <S%H5046><s%> him that I am faint <S%H2470><s%> with love. <S%H160><s%> Friends

How is your beloved <S%H1730><s%> better than another beloved, <S%H1730><s%> you fairest <S%H3303><s%> among women? <S%H802><s%> How is your beloved <S%H1730><s%> better than another beloved, <S%H1730><s%> that you <S%H3602><s%> do so adjure us? <S%H7650><s%> Beloved
My beloved <S%H1730><s%> is white <S%H6703><s%> and ruddy. <S%H122><s%> The best <S%H1713><s%> among ten thousand. <S%H7233><s%>
His head <S%H7218><s%> is like the purest <S%H3800><s%> gold. <S%H6337><s%> His hair <S%H6977><s%> is bushy, <S%H8534><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> as a raven. <S%H6158><s%>
His eyes <S%H5869><s%> are like doves <S%H3123><s%> beside the water <S%H4325><s%> brooks, <S%H650><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> with milk, <S%H2461><s%> mounted like jewels. <S%H3427><s%>

His cheeks <S%H3895><s%> are like a bed <S%H6170><s%> of spices <S%H1314><s%> with towers of perfumes. <S%H4840><s%> <S%H4026><s%> His lips <S%H8193><s%> are like lilies, <S%H7799><s%> dropping <S%H5197><s%> liquid <S%H5674><s%> myrrh. <S%H4753><s%>

His hands <S%H3027><s%> are like rings <S%H1550><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> set <S%H4390><s%> with beryl. <S%H8658><s%> His body <S%H4578><s%> is like ivory <S%H8127><s%> work <S%H6247><s%> overlaid <S%H5968><s%> with sapphires. <S%H5601><s%>

His legs <S%H7785><s%> are like pillars <S%H5982><s%> of marble <S%H8336><s%> set <S%H3245><s%> on sockets <S%H134><s%> of fine gold. <S%H6337><s%> His appearance <S%H4758><s%> is like Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> excellent <S%H977><s%> as the cedars. <S%H730><s%>

His mouth <S%H2441><s%> is sweetness; <S%H4477><s%> yes, <S%H4261><s%> he is altogether lovely. This is my beloved, <S%H1730><s%> and this is my friend, <S%H7453><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
